allow: Bash(uniq -c echo "" echo "Device types seen:" grep -o 'deviceType"""":""""[^""""]*' /tmp/homey-test.log)
Bash(uniq -c echo echo '=== MQTT TOPIC ACTIVITY ===' grep 'Subscribed to' /tmp/homey-test.log)

Bash(tail -1 python3 -c " import json with open\(''/tmp/sth51-tempdata.json''\) as f: line = f.read\(\) # Extract JSON from log line json_start = line.find\(''{''\) if json_start > 0: json_str = line[json_start:] data = json.loads\(json_str\) print\(json.dumps\(data, indent=2\)\) ")

Bash(/Applications/Wireshark.app/Contents/MacOS/tshark -r xsense_mqtt-5.pcap -o tls.keylog_file:xsense_sslkeylog-5.log -Y "mqtt" -T fields -e frame.number -e ip.src -e ip.dst -e mqtt.msgtype -e mqtt.topic -e mqtt.msg)
